code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pgaination=_ref=>{let{productsPerPage,totalProducts,paginate,activePage}=_ref;const pageNumbers=[];for(let i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalProducts/productsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"default-pagination lab-ul",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",onClick:()=>{if(activePage<pageNumbers.length){paginate(activePage-1);}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icofont-rounded-left"})})}),pageNumbers.map(number=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"page-item ".concat(number===activePage?"bg-warning":""),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>paginate(number),className:"bg-transparent",children:number})},number)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",onClick:()=>{if(activePage<pageNumbers.length){paginate(activePage-1);}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icofont-rounded-right"})})})]});};export default Pgaination;
